com.google.zxing.client.rim.persistence.history
Class DecodeHistory

java.lang.Object
  com.google.zxing.client.rim.persistence.history.DecodeHistory

public class DecodeHistory
extends java.lang.Object

Singleton used to persist the history of qrcode URLs decoded by the client. This code was contributed by LifeMarks.

Author:
Matt York (matt@lifemarks.mobi)
